trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for collecting layout scheme characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別，用來收集配置方式的特性。

trans-unit.source: The LayoutSettings class is the base class for types that collect the various characteristics common to a specific user interface (UI) layout scheme, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>.
trans-unit.target: LayoutSettings 類別是基底類別，用於收集特定的使用者介面 (UI) 版面配置，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>各種共通的類型

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current table layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的資料表配置引擎。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A> property is typically used in two contexts: the container that uses a layout scheme, and the child control of the container to which the layout scheme is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A>屬性通常用於兩個內容︰ 容器所使用的版面配置方式，以及要套用的版面配置容器的子控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A>
